content:
I am a research assistant at National Tsing Hua University supervised by Min Sun. After taking CS61A and CS70 at UCBerkeley and Machine Learning by Hsuan-Tien Lin at NTU, I find my passion in Computer Science and decide to pursue PhD to consolidate my research career.
See my CV (last updated April 2019) for more details.

title: Yen-Chi Cheng (Charles)
